entries.entry: Steve reviewed the code Globetrotters created for our first project. The biggest feedback was the nav bar needed better CSS style naming. I created it so I'll need to fix those styles!
Today I learned how to effectively implement event listeners into a site. I also finally figured out how to interact with a server to render these journal entries when I submit them. WOO!

entries.concept: Event Listeners, Complex functions, and remote Zoom group work
entries.entry: Today we spent the day broken out into groups remotely on zoom. The project was to use event listeners to make the page respond by clicking a button/selecting a radio, and updating css classes in specific sections
